pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Milk Thistle 90ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to support natural liver cleansing and detoxification processes.

Wanderlust Milk Thistle is a consciously created plant active in a readily absorbed liquid herbal extract. Milk Thistle is traditionally used in Western Herbal Medicine to maintain healthy liver function and support natural cleansing and detoxification processes.

Size: 90 mL

Warnings

If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

EACH 4.5 mL CONTAINS:

Silybum marianum (Milk Thistle) seed ext. liquid 4.05 mL
Derived from dry ------ 4.05g

Also contains glycerol and peppermint oil
Contains 40.5% alcohol.

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours.
Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

You can expect a bitter taste which is typical of herbal extracts and all of their goodness.

Complemented with natural peppermint oil.

Directions

ADULT DOSAGE:
Using the measured dropper take 4.5 mL daily, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Drop directly onto the tongue or dilute in 30 mL of water or juice and consume immediately. Follow with a glass of water if necessary.

Shake well before use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a cool, dry place away from direct heat and sunlight. Do not use if cap seal is missing or broken.
